data.title: National Science and Technology Plan 2002-2020 PDF
data.meta_description: National Science and Technology Plan 2002-2020(1).pdf - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The National Science and Technology Plan for 2002-2020 (NSTP 2020) is an 18-year plan that defines the direction of science and technology development in the Philippines. It was created through consultations with experts and stakeholders to support economic development goals. The plan has short-term programs from 2002-2004 focusing on research, technology transfer, human resource development, and other areas to help achieve goals in the short and medium term.
